an10.197:4.1: “I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to recollect. …
an10.197:4.3: And what is the principle not to recollect?
an10.197:4.6: This is called the principle not to recollect.
an10.197:5.1: And what is the principle to recollect?
an10.197:5.4: This is called the principle to recollect.”
